sentences.sContent: I took this apple for a pear until I tasted it.
sentences.sContent_eng: I took this apple for a pear until I tasted it.
sentences.sCn: 我误将这个苹果当作梨子，直到我尝了才知道。

sentences.sContent: The pear trees are blossoming out early this year.
sentences.sContent_eng: The pear trees are blossoming out early this year.
sentences.sCn: 今年梨树很早就在开花了。

sentences.sContent: Just toss a cup of berries — strawberries, blueberries, raspberries — and a sliced (but not peeled) apple, peach, or pear into your blender.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just toss a cup of berries — strawberries, blueberries, raspberries — and a sliced (but not peeled) apple, peach, or pear into your blender.
sentences.sCn: 把一杯莓子——草莓、蓝莓、山莓，还有一片没削皮的苹果、桃、或梨子放入你的搅拌机。

phrases.pCn: 仙人掌，仙人球；霸王树（仙人掌的一种）

trans.tranOther: a sweet juicy fruit that has a round base and is thinner near the top, or the tree that produces this fruit
